output.name: IASS2024_workshop_preparation
output.description: Repository containing Python scripts and sample IFC/mesh data for preparing geometry, mesh deserialization, subdivision, and visualization using COMPAS and Rhino for the IASS 2024 workshop.

output.relatedToEPFLJustification:
After exhaustively reviewing all available data for the repository and its sole author, only one piece of EPFL‐related evidence was found:

1. Infoscience record for “Vestartas, Petras” (UUID e6ef0944-84c5-4456-9106-bd0d4f59b0d2) on infoscience.epfl.ch. This indicates an official EPFL research profile and multiple EPFL‐hosted publications. (confidence contribution: 0.4)

No other EPFL indicators were present: the author’s Git commits all use a @gmail.com email; there is no EPFL email, no ORCID employment or affiliation record specifying EPFL, no EPFL or SDSC mention in the bio, README, or company fields, no EPFL organization membership, and no EPFL domain on any related websites. 

Total confidence = 0.4 (< 0.5), thus relatedToEPFL = false.
